main event: A bright white light, oval in shape, was observed moving at a high speed and descending over Miami Beach.
interesting points: The light was so bright that it could be mistaken for a star,The observation lasted for about 7 minutes,Witnesses estimated the altitude of the object to be between 2500 to 3000 feet,The object gradually faded away in the same position,Certain witnesses reported that the light appeared to be intelligently controlled.
